decision_conditions: T.1 Hornbeam - 2-2.5m Holistic crown reshape to suitable growth points (approximately in the same location as historic reduction points) establishing even crown shape for good regrowth & removing any deadwood.
The works proposed are excessive and would result in the loss of more than 50% of the canopy likely resulting in the tree's death.

The application is for change of use, therefore the fee required for your planning application is £ 294.00, we acknowledge the receipt of £264.00, please pay the outstanding balance of £30.00. Payment can be made online via the Kingston council website or our Contact Centre on 020 8547 500.
The proposed front elevation is not labelled, please submit the proposed front elevation with correct labelling.
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
